entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:13 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:13 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
